name: Auralex AI
description: Auralex AI is a blockchain analytics and market intelligence platform that leverages artificial intelligence to simplify and enhance decision-making in the decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem. It provides real-time data aggregation, AI-powered analytics, sentiment tracking, and predictive insights across multiple blockchain networks. The platform aims to make complex blockchain data accessible to both individual and institutional users through an intuitive interface and integrated tools.
